Their identification strategy estimates the average treatment effect ($\beta$) using the following specification:

$$
\begin{aligned}
\ln N_{m, t}=\alpha+ & \beta \text { Treatment }_{m, t}+\delta \boldsymbol{X}_{m, t}+\sum_{m=1}^{225} \theta_m \text { Monitor }_m+\sum_{t=1}^{420} \gamma_t \text { Time }_t \\
& +\varepsilon_{m, t}
\end{aligned}
$$
